channel.title: [317] (PI) New things to code?
channel.description: Hello there, I am looking for some new things to code onto my (PI) RSPS. I can't think of much more to really code, even though there probably might be a lot of content that others might know of so, I thought, I might be able to get some of your guys opinions about it. Any ideas, anyone can give me about anything they'd think would be good to code or have? I know most people think (PI's) are dead or useless, I actually want to keep working on this, so, I can at least maybe try and go far with it! Anyways, let me know what you think guys. Thanks.

item.title: [317] (PI) New things to code?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

A birthday event for each player. Basically just, “Hey, it’s been a year since you signed up! Here’s a present from us at . Happy Birthday!” And then just give the player a present item that when they open, they get a random item. Not something game-breaking, but something nice. Jewelery, a staff if they’re a wizard, a bow if an archer, a sword, some fancy clothes, a free makeover, etc.

It’s not sexy, or game changing, but it’s doable.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] (PI) New things to code?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Mr.Draconian:

So everytime you prestige the max level is higher?

Yeah, and it also gets a little bit higher so it’s more of a challenge (I guess you could say)
Also, that would mean the higher prestige you are, the bigger the range of armour/weapons/tools you have. And maybe have a capped prestige level (E.G. Maximum prestige level 30) and once you reach that maximum, you receive a cape to prove your worthiness or whatever. Or maybe even a special title.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] (PI) New things to code?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Draconian, post:8, topic:550223”]I wrote a new skill.(It’s called Prestige :D)
The max prestige level is 50,Everytime your prestige your xp rate gets higher,and there are items that their requirements are Prestige levels.[/quote]
Nice; everytime you prestige it gets easier to level up? Surely you should make it harder xD
Unless as you prestige, you have to level up more
[spoiler=E.G:]Prestige 1: Max level 20
Prestige 2: Max level 40
Prestige 3: Max level 60
Prestige 4: Max level 80
Prestige 5: Max level 100
Prestige 6: Max level 120
ETC…[/spoiler]

Read full topic

item.title: [317] (PI) New things to code?
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

PI is a really good example on how not to write efficient code. That god object (the client class i believe) is horrifying, but if you can manage to rewrite it, you’ll be making all kinds of progress.

item.title: [317] (PI) New things to code?
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:550223”]How about try adding the code properly?

Like 98% of PI needs to be re-written. And there’s maybe like 1% of tutorials out there that give you the “best” code.

You can also work on removing like everything from the process method of Client.java

Add an entity system?

Entity based combat?

JAGGRAB?

Login Server?[/quote]
Exactly what I was looking for! Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] (PI) New things to code?
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

beale:

try adding a bunch of customs items or npc’s. That usually enhances the server’s content

I thought about it, but, I’m really not that much into customs and everyone seems to add them nowadays.
I feel like that customs, sometimes are a pathetic excuse for content, i’m sorry, but this is true.
I’d like to have a few customs, few general colors and maybe a mix up, other than that, i’d hate it tbh.
Thanks anyways.

Read full topic
